meanings.sent1: The chimeric creature in the story had wings and scales, unlike any real animal.
meanings.sent2: Her chimeric dreams of flying to the moon were delightful but not possible in reality.
meanings.sent3: The chimeric idea of a talking cat made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: His chimeric inventions seemed to defy the laws of physics.
meanings.sent5: The chimeric castle in the clouds was a sight to behold in the children's book.

meanings.definition: Composed of different parts or elements
meanings.sent1: The chimeric car had the front of a sports car and the back of a pickup truck.
meanings.sent2: The chimeric necklace was made of pearls, rubies, and emeralds all mixed together.
meanings.sent3: The chimeric cake combined chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry layers in a unique way.
meanings.sent4: Her chimeric outfit matched a formal dress with casual sneakers.
meanings.sent5: The chimeric robot was a blend of metal, plastic, and glass components.

meanings.sent1: The chimeric story she told about a magical land captivated the children's attention.
meanings.sent2: His chimeric paintings were a mix of vibrant colors and surreal shapes.
meanings.sent3: The chimeric idea of a flying pig entertained the audience at the circus.
meanings.sent4: The chimeric world in her mind was filled with talking animals and floating islands.
meanings.sent5: The chimeric adventure in the video game took players to unexplored realms of fantasy.
